amendment.description: To provide funding for the mass layoff statistics program under section 15 of the Wagner-Peyser Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 35 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 35 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S1411-1412; text: CR S1411) To provide funding for the mass layoff statistics program under section 15 of the Wagner-Peyser Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 35 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 35 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kennedy.
